body.name: ASRock B550 Phantom Gaming 4 Supports AMD AM4 Socket Ryzen™ 3000, 3000 G-Series, 4000 G-Series, 5000 and 5000 G-Series Desktop Processors Motherboard
body.merchantInfo: Sold by Amazon Warehouse and Fulfilled by Amazon.
features: 8 Power Phase Design, Digi Power. Operating System Microsoft Windows 10 64-Bit
1 PCIe 4.0 x16, 1 PCIe 3.0 x16, 2 PCIe 3.0 x1, 1 M.2 Key E for WiFi
Not compatible with AMD Athlon Processors
body.description: Phantom Gaming is designed by gamers and for gamers! Underneath its relentless appearance lie plentiful gaming oriented features and excellent gaming capabilities. It’s all about bringing a new gaming experience to gamers!

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.4 4.4 out of 5 stars 700 ratings 4.4 out of 5 stars

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fantastic for the money
reviews.reviewText: This motherboard is fantastic, it's incredibly stable and all of my BIOs modifications took without issue. Flashing the newest version of the BIOs was easy and the AsRock update utility may look ugly but it works well. I will probably always buy AsRock as their boards have always been stable without any tweaking and I've had issues with boards from other vendors.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 29, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Thought it would be meh, but it's really good
reviews.reviewText: The pictures don't do the product justice. I thought it looked pretty bad, but I bought a "like new" one for almost half off. I was very surprised by the weight and quality of materials used, the solder is not pointy, and it doesn't creek or crack under normal pressure when inserting cables. Also it was relatively simple to remove the m.2 standoffs to shift to a smaller size. The manual even mentions the yellow tape is removable which stumped me. Super happy about that.I'm using a be quiet dark rock 4 cooler on top and the vrms barely get warm still, so the cooling is more than good, despite the looks. This is paid with a 3700x.Other than USB 3.2 type c front panel, this board has all the basics, super happy with the purchase. ASRock has not given me a bad board yet.This was to replace an MSI b550 board that I had to send back twice and then I just returned on the 3rd try because it was not working with the same hardware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comes with BIOS P2.40
reviews.reviewText: Bought to use with a Ryzen R5 5600X CPU. Motherboard arrived with BIOS P2.40 as of October 2023, so R5 series CPUs are compatible out of the box. Good budget B550 mobo, works well out of the box (no overclocking/bios changes).

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2020
reviews.reviewText: The board worked great for 1 week.Mine didn't work with XMP profile, it was causing constant BSOD and Crashes to desktop while gaming and sometimes youtube videos would freeze. Tried everything including trying out all the BIOS versions available at the moment. I also used it to work from home using teamviewer and what not. It didn't crash on those situations. It could go hours without crashing. 2 weeks worth of troubleshooting and suggestions from Asrock and nothing worked. Will receive another board and see if that one works.**UPDATE: Decided to purchase a MSI B550 Tomahawk before initiating RMA to see if the problems persisted. They have. Conclusion: My Ryzen 3 3300X is the culprit. Already initiated RMA request for that one.For reference my specs are:-Corsair 3200Mhz 8GB x 2 and OLOy 3200Mhz 8GB x 2 (I bought the OLOy because at first I thought the problem was my RAM.-Ryzen 3300x-Corsair CX450-Zotac 1650 Super-NVME WD 550 Blue 500 GB

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent for a new computer build.
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for a new computer build along with 32 MB of RAM. I checked my specs online and according to the site this combo will play any new game, although I really didn't buy it for gaming. Furthermore, I would recommend this for a new computer if you plan on building one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars I receive a used item
reviews.reviewText: I BOUGHT FOR A NEW ITEM AND I GOT A USED MOTHERBOARD WITH THERMAL PASTE STAINS EVEN WITH SOME HAIRS IN THE BAG INSIDE. DEFINITELY I NEVER WONT BUY AS ROCK AGAIN AND I'D NEVER RECOMMEND SOMEONE TO BUY THINGS FROM THIS BRAND.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No real caveats for the price
reviews.reviewText: This board works flawlessly out of the box (at least it does now). The BIOS version on the board I received was P1.50. According to ASRock's website, any BIOS newer than P1.20 supports Ryzen 5000. I intend to pair this board with a 5600X. Some people have received outdated BIOS versions, but that issue seems to have cleared up.I got the board on sale for $90, which is a bang-good price. It isn't very flashy, and the IO shield is rather cheap, but the build quality of the board isn't bad either. The 2oz copper traces really help with heat management, making this board really good for overclocking as long as you have an appropriate cooling solution.The board comes with FOUR M.2 slots (2 Gen4, 2 Gen3) because the M.2 slots are double stacked. This particular model lacks Wi-Fi support, but it does have an M.2 slot for Wi-Fi.The board only has one PCIe x16 slot, so if you intended to rock multiple GPUs you are going to need something more expensive.Overall, very good motherboard and incredibly good price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very good for the money
reviews.reviewText: Works as it should, no frills, but good and straight to the point

This product is just another example of how the manufacturers have their finger on the pulse of what the end user really needs. Somewhere 25 years ago i gotr drawn to the 'fancy, all plastic, colorful and lite em up" products. I use to just buy bog standard 'no frills' mainboards. Thats what this is and i am glad to have broken free. This board is tops with me...rememeber that the new bios thinks differently than years ago. Good job

Da ich viel Repariere und ich gebeten wurde ein Mainboard mit zu bestellen.Konnte es aber dennoch nicht brauchen weil nicht das Mainboard sondern die Grafikkarte Defekt war.Der Kunde wollte den PC Montag schon vorbei bringen, ist aber was dazwischen gekommen deswegen hat er es erst heute vorbei gebracht, sonst hätte ich das Frühzeitig erkannt.Vorsicht ist die Mutter der Porzellankiste um eines dennoch Tauschen zu können eben mit bestellt.Über Das Mainboard selbst kann ich sagen es ist von der Qualität her steht es dem Asus in nichts nach.

reviews.reviewTitle: Una excelente opción calidad-precio, pero arriesgada si no sabes lo que haces
reviews.reviewText: De todos los componentes que compré para mi equipo, este es el único que me causó algunos contratiempos. La documentación es escasa de forma oficial y en foros de internet, la BIOS es un poco más complicada en comparación a la de otras placas, y no es muy clara en cuanto a usabilidad.Definitivamente no la recomiendo para cualquier usuario, especialmente a primerizos o enajenados en el armado de PC, aunque para los entusiastas, es una excelente opción para ahorrar un poco en el presupuesto sin sacrificar rendimiento o características básicas. Tiene todo lo que cualquier usuario centrado en rendimiento por dinero requiere.No cuenta con la BIOS actualizada para utilizar Zen 3, al menos a enero 2021, así que ojo con requerir de un procesador Zen 2 prestado o viejo, y el precio se justifica en que solamente podrás utilizar procesadores Zen 2 (sin gráficos integrados/APU) para arrancar la BIOS. Advierto por que yo me lancé a la suerte para resolver esto sobre la marcha, pero muchos pueden no contar con la posibilidad.Tiene muy buena cantidad de puertos, y sus posibilidades de conectividad son bastante amplias. Los LED de arranque pueden resultar de ayuda, o pueden llegar a confundir un poco más. Para una PC de gama media-alta, no le pide nada a otros modelos y marcas.Recomendada para gastar sólo lo necesario sin sacrificar espacio de mejora, y para entendidos del armado que puedan resolver cualquier inconveniente que pueda surgir sin contar con tanto apoyo de la documentación

Giusto per fare un upgrade al mio vecchio PC!Ho preso una scheda che era già aperta in una scatola leggermente danneggiata (warehouse) però la scheda intatta! Tutto sommato va a scheggia, finito il sistema con l’installazione del win11! Quindi direi ottimo prodotto con una fascia di prezzo basso!
